models.name: BlenderBot
models.author: Facebook
description: The Blender chatbot model (BlenderBot 1.0) was first proposed in the paper, Recipes for building an open-domain chatbot on 30th April 2020. This is a deep learning model that has been trained to interact and respond like a conversational agent.

The latest release is the BlenderBot 2.0. The model uses a standard seq2seq model transformer-based architecture to generate responses. This architecture uses Transformers as its base, initially proposed in a paper by Googleâ€™s research team.
